Package trashday.ui.responses

Organizes all the functions that provide voice responses to the user.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ResponseHelpers
    Provides some "helper" functions that make the code more readable for all child classes.
    ResponsesExit
    Organizes all the voice responses for Alexa "stop" and "exit" intents.
    ResponsesHelp
    Organizes all the voice responses for Alexa "help" intent.
    ResponsesSchedule
    Organizes all the voice responses when talking about the Trash Day Schedule itself.
    ResponsesYesNo
    Organizes all the voice responses for Alexa "Yes" and "No" intents.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Phrase
    Organizes the phrases used by the application.

Package trashday.ui.responses Description

Organizes all the functions that provide voice responses to the user. This makes it easier to re-use common response text and card information.
Author:
J. Todd Baldwin
See Also:
Alexa Skills Kit Docs: Java Library Reference, Including a Card in Your Skill's Response, Best Practices for Skill Card Design
